Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

I purchased the game some time ago, now I want to reinstall it again as I think my current game is corrupted (stalls, etc.)

Logging into my account, there is no download button anymore! What's new with this? I did that already some time ago as the new version came out, the download button used to be always there...

Greatful for any help

Christian
I knew this would come in handy.

I KNOW!

But the "Click to Download" Button simply is not there!

That's weird, I just looked and mine's there, maybe try another browser?  I'm using Firefox here.

If you have KSP in your account you should have a download button, unless you transferred to Steam and forgot.

If you have a Steam account check it for KSP.
I have Firefox, I have my KSP-Account, I did not tranfser to Steam. It is just not there
Bogy71, please email Squad support at [email protected] with this issue, as there is nothing we at the forums can do to resolve it.
Had the same problem.  Clear your browser cache, and it shows up again.
